examplePhrases: Alexa ask parkly if there are any parking spaces?
en-GB.name: Parkly
en-GB.description:
In this skill you are able top check for any available parking spaces in your nearest hospital.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Parkly" or "Alexa, open Parkly" to start".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
